Browse the source code of qtbase-6.5.0/src/3rdparty/harfbuzz-ng/src/OT/Layout/GPOS/PairSet.hh

1#ifndef OT_LAYOUT_GPOS_PAIRSET_HH
2#define OT_LAYOUT_GPOS_PAIRSET_HH
3
4#include "PairValueRecord.hh"
5
6namespace OT {
7namespace Layout {
8namespace GPOS_impl {
9
10
11template <typename Types>
12struct PairSet
13{
14 template <typename Types2>
15 friend struct PairPosFormat1_3;
16
17 using PairValueRecord = GPOS_impl::PairValueRecord<Types>;
18
19 protected:
20 HBUINT16 len; /* Number of PairValueRecords */
21 PairValueRecord firstPairValueRecord;
22 /* Array of PairValueRecords--ordered
23 * by GlyphID of the second glyph */
24 public:
25 DEFINE_SIZE_MIN (2);
26
27 static unsigned get_size (unsigned len1, unsigned len2)
28 {
29 return Types::HBGlyphID::static_size + Value::static_size * (len1 + len2);
30 }
31 static unsigned get_size (const ValueFormat valueFormats[2])
32 {
33 unsigned len1 = valueFormats[0].get_len ();
34 unsigned len2 = valueFormats[1].get_len ();
35 return get_size (len1, len2);
36 }
37
38 struct sanitize_closure_t
39 {
40 const ValueFormat *valueFormats;
41 unsigned int len1; /* valueFormats[0].get_len() */
42 unsigned int stride; /* bytes */
43 };
44
45 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c, const sanitize_closure_t *closure) const
46 {
47 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
48 if (!(c->check_struct (this)
49 && c->check_range (&firstPairValueRecord,
50 len,
51 closure->stride))) return_trace (false);
52
53 unsigned int count = len;
54 const PairValueRecord *record = &firstPairValueRecord;
55 return_trace (closure->valueFormats[0].sanitize_values_stride_unsafe (c, this, &record->values[0], count, closure->stride) &&
56 closure->valueFormats[1].sanitize_values_stride_unsafe (c, this, &record->values[closure->len1], count, closure->stride));
57 }
58
59 bool intersects (const hb_set_t *glyphs,
60 const ValueFormat *valueFormats) const
61 {
62 unsigned record_size = get_size (valueFormats);
63
64 const PairValueRecord *record = &firstPairValueRecord;
65 unsigned int count = len;
66 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
67 {
68 if (glyphs->has (k: record->secondGlyph))
69 return true;
70 record = &StructAtOffset<const PairValueRecord> (record, record_size);
71 }
72 return false;
73 }
74
75 void collect_glyphs (hb_collect_glyphs_context_t *c,
76 const ValueFormat *valueFormats) const
77 {
78 unsigned record_size = get_size (valueFormats);
79
80 const PairValueRecord *record = &firstPairValueRecord;
81 c->input->add_array (&record->secondGlyph, len, record_size);
82 }
83
84 void collect_variation_indices (hb_collect_variation_indices_context_t *c,
85 const ValueFormat *valueFormats) const
86 {
87 unsigned record_size = get_size (valueFormats);
88
89 const PairValueRecord *record = &firstPairValueRecord;
90 unsigned count = len;
91 for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; i++)
92 {
93 if (c->glyph_set->has (k: record->secondGlyph))
94 { record->collect_variation_indices (c, valueFormats, this); }
95
96 record = &StructAtOffset<const PairValueRecord> (record, record_size);
97 }
98 }
99
100 bool apply (hb_ot_apply_context_t *c,
101 const ValueFormat *valueFormats,
102 unsigned int pos) const
103 {
104 TRACE_APPLY (this);
105 hb_buffer_t *buffer = c->buffer;
106 unsigned int len1 = valueFormats[0].get_len ();
107 unsigned int len2 = valueFormats[1].get_len ();
108 unsigned record_size = get_size (len1, len2);
109
110 const PairValueRecord *record = hb_bsearch (buffer->info[pos].codepoint,
111 &firstPairValueRecord,
112 len,
113 record_size);
114 if (record)
115 {
116 if (HB_BUFFER_MESSAGE_MORE && c->buffer->messaging ())
117 {
118 c->buffer->message (font: c->font,
119 fmt: "try kerning glyphs at %u,%u",
120 c->buffer->idx, pos);
121 }
122
123 bool applied_first = valueFormats[0].apply_value (c, base: this, values: &record->values[0], glyph_pos&: buffer->cur_pos());
124 bool applied_second = valueFormats[1].apply_value (c, base: this, values: &record->values[len1], glyph_pos&: buffer->pos[pos]);
125
126 if (applied_first || applied_second)
127 if (HB_BUFFER_MESSAGE_MORE && c->buffer->messaging ())
128 {
129 c->buffer->message (font: c->font,
130 fmt: "kerned glyphs at %u,%u",
131 c->buffer->idx, pos);
132 }
133
134 if (HB_BUFFER_MESSAGE_MORE && c->buffer->messaging ())
135 {
136 c->buffer->message (font: c->font,
137 fmt: "tried kerning glyphs at %u,%u",
138 c->buffer->idx, pos);
139 }
140
141 if (applied_first || applied_second)
142 buffer->unsafe_to_break (start: buffer->idx, end: pos + 1);
143
144 if (len2)
145 {
146 pos++;
147 // https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/issues/3824
148 // https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/issues/3888#issuecomment-1326781116
149 buffer->unsafe_to_break (start: buffer->idx, end: pos + 1);
150 }
151
152 buffer->idx = pos;
153 return_trace (true);
154 }
155 buffer->unsafe_to_concat (start: buffer->idx, end: pos + 1);
156 return_trace (false);
157 }
158
159 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c,
160 const ValueFormat valueFormats[2],
161 const ValueFormat newFormats[2]) const
162 {
163 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
164 auto snap = c->serializer->snapshot ();
165
166 auto *out = c->serializer->start_embed (*this);
167 if (unlikely (!c->serializer->extend_min (out))) return_trace (false);
168 out->len = 0;
169
170 const hb_set_t &glyphset = *c->plan->glyphset_gsub ();
171 const hb_map_t &glyph_map = *c->plan->glyph_map;
172
173 unsigned len1 = valueFormats[0].get_len ();
174 unsigned len2 = valueFormats[1].get_len ();
175 unsigned record_size = get_size (len1, len2);
176
177 typename PairValueRecord::context_t context =
178 {
179 this,
180 valueFormats,
181 newFormats,
182 len1,
183 &glyph_map,
184 &c->plan->layout_variation_idx_delta_map
185 };
186
187 const PairValueRecord *record = &firstPairValueRecord;
188 unsigned count = len, num = 0;
189 for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; i++)
190 {
191 if (glyphset.has (k: record->secondGlyph)
192 && record->subset (c, &context)) num++;
193 record = &StructAtOffset<const PairValueRecord> (record, record_size);
194 }
195
196 out->len = num;
197 if (!num) c->serializer->revert (snap);
198 return_trace (num);
199 }
200};
201
202
203}
204}
205}
206
207#endif // OT_LAYOUT_GPOS_PAIRSET_HH
208
